runs.comm: what a start for Parchment, he walks down the pitch and hits Pollock with a flat bat over mid-off, Pollock saw him coming and bowled it a little shorter but it didn't matter to Parchment
Parchment pokes at one which angles into him and gets an outside edge that falls short of first slip
Parchment walks down again and plays a loose drive, he was no where near that as it passed  his outside edge
what a statement the debutant is making, he steps out to Pollock and hammers him with a flat bat over the long-on boundary, that's a massive six and he's giving West Indies an excellent start
Parchment swings once again but misses this time
I spoke too soon, Parchment tries to force Pollock over the off side, the ball isn't short enough to free his arms and he hits it straight to Duminy at cover, that's the end of Parchment's cameo
Smith gets off the mark by outside-edging a good length ball towards third man
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
what a strike, the length was far too full from Ntini, Morton clears his front foot out of the way and sends umpire Jerling hurrying for cover with a powerful straight hit, that raced to the boundary
defended off the back foot towards midwicket
too short and too wide, Morton gets onj to the back foot and smashes it with tremendous power towards the left of Duminy at cover, it was airborne but Duminy had no chance of stopping that
defended off the back foot towards cover point
good length delivery on middle and off, Smith defends towards cover
slower ball but the line is a bit too straight, Smith turns it towards square leg for a single
Morton picks up Pollocks fuller length early and lofts one towards long-on, the ball bounces well short of the fielder
Smith steps down the track towards Pollock and drives him to Morkel at mid-on
length delivery from Pollock, Morton gets his front foot out of the way and tees off like a golfer, he's hit that on to the roof right back over Pollock's head
he tries to do it again but misses this time
good length ball on middle and off, Smith cuts to the fielder at point
the change of pace doesn't work for Steyn, Smith picks it up early and lofts it right back over his head for another boundary
Steyn follows the slower ball with the fast yorker, it swings back late into the left hander, Smith is too late on the drive and the ball uproots off stump, excellent fast bowling
now that is quick, probably quicker than anything we've seen all day, Chanderpaul is very late on the drive outside off stump and gets beaten
short of a length outside off stump, it climbs steeply on the left-hander and Chanderpaul lets it go
Chanderpaul tries to squeeze a full and wide ball through point, Gibbs dives to his left and makes a super save
short of a length delivery outside off stump, driven off the back foot towards cover
now that isn't that short but Morton gets on to the back foot in a trice and pulls powerfully in front of midwicket for four
fuller length angling into the right-hander's off stump, Morton defends hurriedly on the back foot
Ntini spears a full ball from wide of the crease into Morton's pads, he misses the flick but gets a leg bye behind point
Chanderpaul steers the ball towards third man for a single
another full ball angling into the pads, Morton plays it off his pads towards square leg
this is exemplary fast bowling, Steyn fires in another yorker, it sears into Morton's pads, ricochets and knocks off stump out of the ground, he is pumped

that was so close to off stump, Samuels backed away an tried to hit Steyn through the offside, not the best thing to do when Steyn is bowling at such pace, he misses and the ball nearly shaves off stump
he backs away again, Steyn follows him and Samuels works the ball towards mid-off for a single
flicked off the pads for another single

Steyn is giving that off stump a real pounding, after two extremely quick deliveries Steyn foxes Samuels with a slower one, Samuels had backed away to hit it through the off side was too early on the shot, he was no doubt expecting a much faster one and lost his off stump

Bravo has no defense to another fierce yorker, he moves across his stumps, the ball grazes the tip of his boot before knocking off and middle stump out of the ground once again, Dale Steyn is loving it and West Indies are stuttering
Chanderpaul pushes the ball towards Gibbs at point, Ramdin sets off for a single but Chanderpaul sends him back, Gibbs throws at the bowlers end and it would have been tight had he hit
defended towards Gibbs at point once again
Chanderpaul tries to cut one too close to his body and gets a bottom edge close to his off stump
Chanderpaul moves forward and drives towards mid-off for a single
Ramdin tries to flick a leg-stump delivery down to fine leg, he misses and AB de Villiers dives to his left to collect the ball off the pad
defended off the front foot towards the off side
Chanderpaul moves across his stumps and flicks off his hips behind square

South Africa have missed a run-out, Ramdin pushes a slower ball to mid-on, Chanderpaul sets off from the non-striker's end but Ramdin sends him back, mid-on rushes in but misses the stumps at the bowlers end
Steyn unleashes another yorker but Ramdin keeps it out
bowled shorter in length outside off stump, Ramdin lets it go
Steyn looks for another yorker but bowls a fast full toss, Ramdin pushes it to the right of Duminy at mid-on and runs a risky single, if Duminy had hit at the bowler's end Ramdin would have been out
Steyn finishes his spell with a wide full toss, Chanderpaul reaches out for it and plays it to third man
Chanderpaul moves across his stumps and pulls Morkel to deep square leg where Botha dives on the boundary to prevent the four
too full on the pads, Ramdin flicks towards Bodi at deep midwicket for two more
Morkel finds the blockhole this time, Ramdin drives it right back at the bowler
good length ball outside the off stump, Ramdin chops down at it and runs the ball towards third man
tight line and length, Chanderpaul moves across his stumps, gets behind the line and defends, that would have fit right into a Test match
driven of the front foot through covers for a single to bring up the fifty
good length ball outside off, Chanderpaul cuts to Gibbs at point
Chanderpaul moves forward into a delivery that slants across him and drives towards the man on the sweeper boundary
Philander strays down leg side, Ramdin moves towards the off side and tries to flick but misses
defended off the back foot towards backward point

excellent effort from Morkel, he dived full length as the ball was reaching the boundary and nearly pulled it in, Ramdin lofted that sweetly over mid-on and got West Indies within striking distance of the target
that's the victory, Ramdin seals it with a pull behind square for four more, West Indies have won by five wickets with 3.1 overs to spare
